summary: A couple spend their honeymoon in a cabin on a small island in the middle of a forest lake. There's no power nor cellphone connection. He starts behaving strange, not letting her leave the island. She can't swim.
cast: Kip Pardue|Tara Reid|Meredith Baxter|Dan Gunther|Guy J. Graves
keywords: honeymoon|contraception|cigarette smoking|chained to a tree|bottle smashed on head
title: Tormenta en el lago
